history.message:
Hi Katherine,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Katherine,

Wow. What a beautiful poem. We'd be absolutely honored to have this in The Decadent Review.

I'll contact you directly via email (as registered on Submittable) with a draft.


Thank you, and health above all, yours,


D.

Dear Katherine Edgren,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review
